name: prestocookies
description: Gets a list of cookies from the presto card website

scripts.clean: rm -R -f build && rm -R -f node_modules && rm -f lambda.zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run clean && export PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true && npm install --production && npm install typescript --no-save && tsc && npm uninstall typescript
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r lambda.zip node_modules && cd ./build && zip -ru ../lambda.zip . && cd .. && zip -ju lambda.zip ./src/headless-chromium

author: aagavin
